[{"id":"rus","name":"Новая площадка для туристов InTouch.","open":false,"data":{"header":"Новая площадка для туристов InTouch.","text":"

Представляем площадку InTouch. С её помощью турист может получить полезную информацию, приобрести сим-карту с выгодным тарифом, взять в аренду смартфон для любых звонков и доступа в интернет. А также: пользоваться предложениями партнеров на посещение ресторанов или совершение покупок в магазинах сувениров с привлекательной скидкой и т.д. 
Отличительной особенностью (фишкой) проекта являться круглосуточная бесплатная «горячая линия» (call-центр), где турист может быстро получить ответ от живого человека (НЕ робот и НЕ автоответчик!) по любому вопросу, и даже просто поговорить, если туристу стало одиноко.

До сих пор туристы, приезжающие в РФ, мало понимают, как им быть со связью: мобильная связь и мобильный интернет. Постоянно быть на связи с родственниками, искать полезную информацию в интернете, совершать бронирование и банковские операции – неотъемлемый элемент жизни современного человека. 
А как ему быть, оказавшись в новой для себя стране и еще не зная местный язык (даже английский в РФ мало кто знает, не говоря про китайский)? 
Пользоваться роумингом – безумно дорого. Подключаться к бесплатному wi-fi в кафе или метро – опасно (незащищенные сети). Купить местную симку и вставить в свой телефон – непонятно (какой тариф и какого оператора выбрать? Общение в салоне связи с продавцом на языке жестов? Да и удобных предложений для иностранных туристов, особенно на китайском, нет)

Таким образом, главной нишей рынка для нас, является сфера обеспечения второй по значимости базовой потребности любого человека (туриста тем более) (см. пирамида Маслоу) – потребности в безопасности.

Мы хотим, чтобы нас воспринимали не как очередной eTravel стартап (гид-справочник-планировщик или агрегатор скидок и т.д), а как экспертов в обеспечении безопасности (связь/интернет) и удобства/экономии для туристов.

"},"children":false},{"id":"eng","name":"New platform for Tourists InTouch","open":false,"data":{"header":"New platform for Tourists InTouch","text":"

We introduce you new platform InTouch. Tourist can use it to get useful information, buy SIM-card with good rate, rent a smartphone for any calls and internet surfing. Besides: you can check special offers from partners to visit restaurant, buy souvenirs with good discount etc
The key point of project is around a clock free «Hotline» (call center), you can reach it to get a reply from real person (not robot, not autoresponder) to any question you have and even juts chat with him for any question if you feel lonely.

Till now most of tourists, coming to Russia, don’t know much how to manage mobile communication and internet. To be always connected with family, search useful information at internet, to book something or make payments on-line are essential part of the modern person life. So, what he should do after he got into foreign country without knowledge of local language (even English language is a problem at Russia – few people can understand it, not to mention Chinese). Use roaming is extremely expensive. Connect to free wi-fi at café or subway is not safe (they are not protected).  To buy local SIM-card of local operator and install it to the phone is not clear and not convenient (how to choose rate, which operator is better? How to talk with staff at shop? By hands? Besides, there is no any convenient rate for tourists, specially for Chinese).

Therefore, our main market and service is to meet the requirements of 2nd most important basical mans need (specially of tourist)– need of security (according to Maslow’s pyramid). 
We want to be treated not as one of new eTravel start-up (guide, planner, discount machine), but as an expert of providing safety (mobile communication and internet) and benefits/comfort to tourists.

"},"children":false},{"id":"chi","name":"In Touch--为旅行者提供新的平台","open":false,"data":{"header":"In Touch--为旅行者提供新的平台","text":"

我们向您提供新的平台-In Touch。旅游者可以通过使用In Touch获得有用的信息，以优惠价格购买SIM卡，租赁智能手机以便拨打电话和方便上网。 除此之外，您还可以查看合作商提供的优惠产品，餐厅用餐，购买大幅折扣的纪念品，等等。我们的产品的重点是全天候24小时热线（呼叫中心）当您打电话时，您会接收到人工的服务（不是机器人或者系统自动语音服务）来回答您的问题，甚至可以在您感觉到孤独无助的时候跟您聊天。

到现在为止，大多数的来俄罗斯旅游的游客不懂得怎么使手机交流或者用手机上网。时刻跟家人保持联系，在网上搜索有用的信息，在线订购或者在线支付已经成为现代生活中必不可少的一部分。所以，当您进入到一个对当地语言一无所知的国家时，您能做什么？（在俄罗斯，英语甚至也是一个很大的问题---因为很少有人会懂得英文，更别说中文了。）使用漫游是非常的昂贵的。链接免费的咖啡或者地铁Wifi 是非常不安全的（这些Wife没有被安全的保护）。 在当地购买当地运营商的SIM卡，并应用到手机上，通常让人不容易懂并且也不方便。如何选择套餐，哪个营运商更好一点？如何去跟营业员沟通？用手比划，打手势吗？ 另外，没有什么优惠的套餐可以提供给游客，尤其是对中国的游客。

因此，我们主要的市场和服务就是满足人的第二大基本需求（特别是游客的）- 安全需求）。
我们不想被看做是一个新的传统形式的网络旅行社（提供导游，旅行规划，专门的折扣公司），我们想被大众认知为我们是一个专业的为游客提供安全的运营商（电话和上网），让游客感到受益并且感到舒适。

[{"id":"rus","name":"Struggle for Chinese market: expectations and reality. Opinion.","open":false,"data":{"header":"Struggle for Chinese market: expectations and reality. Opinion.","text":"

In our days, China is considered to be almost a gold mine to promote its goods and services. High market capacity, encouraging size of the potential target audience-it seems that all the prerequisites for a successful business are created here. But is everything go so easy and successfully while entering Chinese market? To be close to the reality we give the opinion of a man who has already made an attempt to develop his business in this tempting country for millions.

"...After 4 years of living in China, my optimism is pretty shabby. Once I was as naive as hundreds of Russian businessmen, who are sure that it is enough just to wish - and at the same moment Chinese market will fall to their feet together with buyers, partners and huge cashflow. And, most importantly-almost without any expenses!

Unfortunately, most of inspired plans meet the brutal reality.

You must understand and learn firmly the main thing: going to China is expensive. Very expensive. Stunningly expensive.

In Russia, everything is easier, clearer, and in some cases cheaper, even despite the small market capacity and reduced demand. Testing a niche using Yandex.Direct, the registration of the company that will cost you a 20 and hiring employees who are ready to work rather for the idea than for the money at the initial stage – It is quite common thing for us, and sometimes you can even succeed with this. But not in China!

The very minimum that you need is here:

* Registration of the Chinese legal entity (normally, it is done on the Chinese parent company with the Russian owner, the price of the issue is about 5000 dollars).

* Organization of accounting services - for reporting and payment of taxes.

* Hire at least one employee-a Chinese citizen (without his Chinese id it is impossible to do anything – even open the website).

• Card of the Chinese Bank, registration of accounts at AliPay, WeChat

* Hosting for the site - at least 1000 yuan per year.

* Registration and maintenance of WeChat account - 3500 yuan, webshop there - 2500 yuan.

* Opening and maintaining a webshop at Taobao - 6000 yuan.

* Advertising in WeChat – starts from 50 thousand yuan, Baidu - from 10 thousand plus 5 thousand for settings.

* Always have goods in stock at China.

• Continuous market analysis, monitoring of prices and competitors.

* Patience, patience and once again patience in working with Chinese-people with a unique mentality.

And even in this case, the possibility of business failure is 99%. Of course, there are Russian companies who work in China – but the question of compliance of real profit expectations remains open.

The conclusion is simple: the entry into the Chinese market will not be a gift. Stock up on a decent budget of several million rubles, unlimited patience and endurance and be on guard – only in this case there is a chance of success.

[{"id":"rus","name":"WeChat in Russia: latest news","open":false,"data":{"header":"WeChat in Russia: latest news","text":"

So, what changes from WeChat will please us in the nearest future.

The main news is the provision of WeChat services to Chinese customers in Russia. Technological partner of the project became the company Sendy, which recently signed an agreement with "Wechat" at Guangzhou. However, it is possible that the list of partners will expand.

Since March 2018, Sendy provides payment terminals with support of WeChat Pay service in Moscow and St. Petersburg stores. Moreover, agreements have been concluded with companies that produce payment terminals on the program updating of existing devices to make possible using of WeChat Pay. At the moment, the process has not yet gained strength – there are only a few dozen points where you can pay through "Wechat".

Despite the fact that the service was originally developed for the Chinese, WeChat promises to establish a binding of Russian Bank cards to the system. The partner Bank has not yet been selected, but, according to rumors, it may be Gazprombank.

Another important event is the "Wechat" control panel support termination of admin.wechat.com and a gradual transition to mp.weixin.qq.com. What will it mean for the customers?

* Ability to verify and access all WeChat services for foreign, including Russian accounts.

* Ability to link the current account of the Russian company to the account. Benefits-create a QR code, WeChat-store inside the account and the organization of payment through the "Wechat" on the website or in the mobile application.

At the moment we are engaged in the verification of foreign accounts in "Wechat" and the establishment of WeChat Pay. So far, there are many difficulties, but we hope that following the official meeting in the wechat office in Guangzhou we will be able to resolve most of the difficulties.
